name: Force Index Momentum Analysis
question: Which stocks are showing Force Index buying or selling pressure signals?
retailQuestion: Which stocks have strong buying or selling momentum?
description: Analyzes Force Index to measure the amount of power behind price movements by combining price change with volume. Identifies strong buying pressure (positive spikes) and selling pressure (negative spikes) to confirm trend strength and predict continuation patterns.
